This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the [[Ender Update]] ({{BE}} 1.0.x releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with the [[Boss Update]] (''Bedrock Edition'' 0.16.x releases).

==Mobs==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
|[[Ender dragon]]
|[[File:Ender Dragon.gif|frameless|width=130x130]]
|
{{BiomeLink|The End}}
|
*{{xp|12}},000
|Defeating it activates the [[exit portal]] that allows return to the [[Overworld]], spawns [[End gateway]]s and leaves a dragon egg (defeating it twice).
|-
|[[Shulker]]
|[[File:Shulker.png|frameless|198x198px]]
|
{{EnvLink|End City}}
|
*{{xp|5}} (when killed by a [[player]] or tamed [[wolf]])
{{Drop|Item|Shulker Shell}}
|
* Shulkers can be stood on like a [[block]].
* When attacking, shulkers open their shell and will shoot projectiles with the appearance of white sea urchins.
* Shulkers do not despawn in Peaceful, but will not attack or target players.
|-
|[[Endermite]]
|[[File:Endermite.gif|frameless|128x128px]]
|N/A
|
*{{xp|3}} (when killed by a [[player]] or tamed [[wolf]])
|5% chance it is spawned when an [[ender pearl]] lands.
|-
|[[Polar bear]]
|[[File:Polar Bear JE1 BE1.png|frameless|width=128x128]]
|
{{BiomeLink|Frozen River}}<br>{{BiomeLink|Snowy Plains}}<br>{{BiomeLink|Ice Spikes}}<br>{{BiomeLink|Frozen Ocean}}<br>{{BiomeLink|Deep Frozen Ocean}}<br>
{{BiomeLink|Snowy Slopes}}<br>
{{BiomeLink|Jagged Peaks}}<br>
{{BiomeLink|Frozen peaks}}
|
* {{xp|1|3}} (when killed by a [[player]] or tamed [[wolf]])<br>{{Drop|item|Raw Fish}}<br>{{Drop|item|Raw Salmon}}
|
* When hit, the adults will attack the [[player]], the cubs will run away.
* Adults will always attack the player when cubs are around.
* Polar bear cubs will follow adults.
* Polar bears can swim fast in [[water]].
|}

===Changed===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}} 
|-
|General
|
|
* Lured mobs no longer push the player around when they're riding a pig/horse/mule/donkey.
* "Dye" button is now displayed when attempting to dye a sheep.
* Tweaked the slime/magma cube loot drops to the way they should be.
* Mobs killed by tamed mobs will now drop experience.
|-
|[[Baby zombie]]s
| {{Animate|Baby Zombie Revision 1.png;Baby Zombie Farmer.png;Baby Husk JE1 BE1.png|128px}} 
|Now drop loot upon death.
|-
|[[Snow golem]]
|[[File:Snow Golem JE1 BE1.png|128px]]
|Now attack [[silverfish]].
|-
|[[Villager]]
|[[File:Farmer.png|128px]]
|Now turn into zombie villagers when they are killed by a [[husk]].
|-
|[[Cow]]
|[[File:Cow JE4 BE1.png|128px]]
|Only adult cows can be milked.
|-
|[[Pig]]
|[[File:Pig JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
|[[Potato]]es and [[beetroot]]s can once again be used to feed and breed it.
|-
|[[Wither]]
|[[File:Wither JE1 BE1.png|128px]]
|No longer hostile to wither skeletons and strays.
|-
|[[Magma cube]]
|[[File:Magma Cube JE1 BE1.png|128px]]
|No longer take damage from water.
|-
|[[Endermen]]
|[[File:Enderman BE.png|128px]]
|
* Now drop 0-1 ender pearls upon death.
* Negative effects from splash potions no longer affect endermen (as they teleport away quickly).
|-
|[[Horse]],<br>[[donkey]],<br>[[mule]]
|{{Animate|White Horse Revision 1.png; Donkey JE1.png; Mule JE1.png|128px}}
|Untamed horses/mules/donkeys no longer follow the player when they're holding food.
|-
|[[Blaze]]
|[[File:Blaze BE2.png|128px]]
|Tweaked the charge time for attacks to match other editions.
|}

==Items==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Items}}
|-
|[[Chorus fruit]]
|[[File:Chorus Fruit JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Chorus fruits can be obtained by breaking chorus plants.
|
* Chorus fruits give {{hunger|4}} hunger points when eaten.
* Chorus fruits will teleport entity to a random nearby location when eaten, like an [[enderman]].
* Chorus fruits can be eaten even if the player's hunger bar is full, similar to [[golden apple]]s.
* Chorus fruits can be cooked in the furnace to obtain popped chorus fruits.
|-
|[[Dragon's breath]]
|[[File:Dragon's Breath JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|The dragon's breath can be obtained by scooping up the ender dragon's breath attack or dragon fireball clouds in an empty [[glass bottle|bottle]].
|The dragon's breath can be used to brew lingering potions with a [[splash potion]].
|-
|[[Elytra]]
|[[File:Elytra (item) JE1 BE1.png|84px]][[File:Broken Elytra (item) JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Elytra can be found on End ships within an [[item frame]].
|
* Players can enter to glide when equipped in the "chestplate" slot.
* Elytra take damage at a rate of 1/s when working.
* When durability reaches 1, the elytra stop working until they are repaired. Elytra will never fully break.
** Using [[leather]]s to repair elytra.
* The elytra texture defaults to the cape texture if the player owns a [[cape]].
|-
|[[End crystal]]
|[[File:End Crystal (item) JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|A1=Glass
|B1=Glass
|C1=Glass
|A2=Glass
|B2=Eye of Ender
|C2=Glass
|A3=Glass
|B3=Ghast Tear
|C3=Glass
|Output= End Crystal}}
|
* The item form of [[End crystal]].
* It will summon an End crystal when using it on [[bedrock]] or [[obsidian]].
** Summoned End crystals have no bottom plate, unlike normal End crystals.
|-
|[[Eye of ender]]
|[[File:Eye of Ender JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
  |Blaze Powder
  |Ender Pearl
  |Output=Eye of Ender
  |type=Miscellaneous
}}
|
* When thrown, flies in the direction of the stronghold.
* Used to activate the End Portal.
|-
|[[Popped chorus fruit]]
|[[File:Popped Chorus Fruit JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Smelting|Chorus Fruit|Popped Chorus Fruit}}
|
* Popped chorus fruits are no longer be edible.
* Popped chorus fruits can be used to craft purpur blocks.
|-
|[[Shulker shell]]
|[[File:Shulker Shell JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Has a 50% chance of being dropped by a [[shulker]] upon death
|To make [[shulker box]]es
|-
|[[Spawn egg]]s
|{{Animate|Shulker Spawn Egg BE1.png; Endermite Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png;Polar Bear Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png|84px}}
|Available in the creative inventory.
|Can be used to spawn [[shulker]]s, [[endermite]]s, and [[polar bear]]s.
|}

===Changed===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Items}}
|-
|General
|
|
* The player can now auto-equip armor by tapping and holding.
* Transferring items between containers should be faster now.
* There is now an animation for throwing items.
|-
|[[Tipped arrow]]
|[[File:Arrow of Night Vision JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|The method to get tipped arrows like in Java 1.9 is added; however, it still works with [[cauldron]]s.
|-
|[[Enchanted golden apple]]
|[[File:Enchanted Golden Apple JE1 BE1.gif|84px]]
|Tweaked so they have the correct amount of absorption health points.
|-
|[[Pumpkin]]
|[[File:Carved Pumpkin (S) JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Wearing one now prevents endermen from becoming aggressive after being looked at.
|-
|[[Milk bucket]]
|[[File:Milk Bucket JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Can now be consumed in Creative mode.
|-
|[[Beetroot]] and<br> [[Beetroot soup]]
|[[File:Beetroot JE1 BE1.png|84px]] <br> [[File:Beetroot Soup JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|Now appear in the Creative inventory.
|}
